column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.

Vertigo is a sense of dizziness or spinning. It can be a symptom of many medical conditions, some of which can be more serious than others. To help determine the cause of your vertigo, I recommend an evaluation by a doctor who can perform a medical history, physical examination, and/or tests. Treatment of vertigo depends on the underlying cause, so it's important to have a proper diagnosis first. In the meantime, I recommend avoiding activities that cause dizziness or spinning, staying hydrated, getting adequate sleep, and avoiding alcohol or drug intake.
